articles.title: China shares trade lower even as economic data beats expectations; South Korea leads gains in Asia - CNBC
articles.description: Data released Monday showed retail sales in China rising 4.9% year-on-year in October, higher than the 3.5% predicted in a Reuters poll.
articles.content:
